entry.title: Mark this RSS feed!
entry.content:
I try to be a spammer! I'm not going to send out bulk emails to everyone unless it's absolutely required. You can subscribe to this RSS feed on your favourite reader, or use something like ifttt.com to get them emailed to you.

There are also comments enabled for each update. This serves as a kind of email thread as needed. Please let the group know any concerns/questions you have as we go through each week.
